text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Anatomical location where the blood pressure was measured.

purpose.value: This BodyStructure resource represents the AnatomicalLocation concept (NL-CM:12.4.12) of Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) BloodPressure v5.0 (2024)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/BloodPressure-v5.0(2024EN)).
